Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards

Interface Pluggable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimalGoldFrontFace, AnimalResourceFrontFace, CardFace, FungiGoldFrontFace, FungiResourceFrontFace, GoldFrontFace, InsectGoldFrontFace, InsectResourceFrontFace, KingdomBackFace, KingdomCardFace, PlantGoldFrontFace, PlantResourceFrontFace, ResourceFrontFace, StarterCardBackFace, StarterCardFace, StarterCardFrontFace
public interface Pluggable
The attributes of any element that can be plugged to other elements inside the playing board.
